text: , also known as ', is a Japanese animator best known for illustrating the light novel Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions, which has been adapted into two anime television series and a film by Kyoto Animation. ==Works== * (as Nozomi Ōsaka) Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions * (as Non) Adachi to Shimamura * (as Non) Nanana's Buried Treasure ==References== ==External links== * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Manga artists
title: Nozomi Ōsaka
